content: CMP Update - Your user account is [state]
The password entered by you on CMP is incorrect. Enter the correct password or use Forgot Password to reset it.
You have logged on to CMP.
[mobileOtp] is the OTP (One Time Password) to update settings on CMP
Your email has been changed to [newMail].
You are invited to collaborate on the document [documentName] on CMP. Please log on to check the details.
You have received a new message on CMP. Log on to view it.
You have a tag suggestion. Please log on to check the details.
A tag suggested by you on CMP is approved. Please log on to check the details.
A tag suggested by you on CMP is rejected. Please log on to check the details.
Document [documentName] has been published on CMP. Please log on to check the details.
Document [documentName] is unpublished from CMP. Please log on to check the details.
A new comment has been added to Document [documentName] in CMP.
The document [documentName] on CMP, is replaced with a new document. Please log on to check the details.
Your current role on CMP is replaced with [role]
A new comment has been added to Document [documentName] in CMP. Please log on to check.
A new task has been assigned to you by [creatorName] on CMP
Status of task:[taskId] is updated on CMP
A new document is attached to the task:[taskId] on CMP.
Another task is linked to the task:[taskId] on CMP.
New tag is added to task:[taskId] on CMP.
Due Date of the task [taskId] is updated on CMP.
Start Date of the task [taskId] is updated on CMP.
You have updated your user profile on CMP.
Document [documentName], has been updated with new [text] on CMP.

Dear [fullName],

As updated on the CITIIS Management Platform, your Password has been updated.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
You are added to a project [projectName] on CMP.
